title: Collision Types Comparison MicroSim
description: Interactive physics simulation comparing elastic, inelastic, and perfectly inelastic collisions. Demonstrates conservation of momentum and kinetic energy principles through animated visualizations with real-time data displays.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Physics
Collisions
Momentum
Kinetic Energy
Conservation Laws
Elastic Collision
Inelastic Collision
Mechanics
coverage: High School Physics, AP Physics 1, Introductory College Physics
